item.title: Treasury Market’s ‘New World Order’ Brings Fear of the Long Bond
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The “Sell America” trade that gripped markets this month has left a potentially lasting dent in investors’ willingness to hold the US government’s longest-maturity debt, a mainstay of its deficit-financing toolkit.
